title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: Experience the galaxy far, far away and reshape the destiny of the Rebel Alliance. Your choices could change the fate of the Empire and the Force itself.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.description: A young farm boy destined to become a Jedi Knight
characters.personality: idealistic, brave, impatient, strong with the Force
characters.background: Raised on Tatooine, unaware of his true parentage and destiny

characters.name: Princess Leia
characters.description: Leader of the Rebel Alliance and secret twin sister to Luke
characters.background: Adopted princess of Alderaan, dedicated to fighting the Empire

characters.name: Han Solo
characters.description: Smuggler and captain of the Millennium Falcon
characters.personality: roguish, sarcastic, loyal when it matters, skeptical
characters.background: Independent smuggler who gets caught up in the Rebellion

characters.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
characters.description: Former Jedi Knight and Luke's mentor
characters.personality: wise, patient, mysterious, haunted by the past
characters.background: Hermit on Tatooine, watching over Luke and hiding from the Empire

checkpoints.sceneDescription: Luke has found part of Leia's message and must decide how to proceed with this dangerous information.
